type.name: org.gradle.ide.visualstudio.VisualStudioSolution
type.description:
A visual studio solution, representing one or more org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeBinarySpec instances from the same org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeComponentSpec.

The content and location of the generate solution file can be modified by the supplied methods: 

 
  apply plugin: "visual-studio" 
  model {name}.sln" 
              solutionFile.withContent { TextProvider content -> 
                  content.asBuilder().insert(0, "# GENERATED FILE: DO NOT EDIT\n") 
                  content.text = content.text.replaceAll("HideSolutionNode = FALSE", "HideSolutionNode = TRUE") 
              } 
          } 
      } 
  }

method.name: getComponent
method.description: The component that this solution represents.

method.name: getProjects
method.description: The set of projects included in this solution.

method.name: getSolutionFile
method.description: Configuration for the generated solution file.

property.name: component
property.description: The component that this solution represents.

property.name: projects
property.description: The set of projects included in this solution.

property.name: solutionFile
property.description: Configuration for the generated solution file.
